Testimony from Annette Monod-Leiris

Annette Monod-Leiris, born in 1909, discusses her assignments as a social worker in various internment camps, such as Beaune, Drancy, Pithiviers and Voves.

Watch the full interview in French | Accession Number: 2001.5.2
